The reason why I'm not excited is:
!http://www.comicbookmovie.com/images/uploads/Zod%20Superman%20battle%20aftermath_04.jpg!
!http://www.thegeekocracy.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/destruction.jpg!

. . . Here's a crazy idea for a superman vs batman movie: have the fighting in fucking middle of nowhere instead of a populated city with millions of people.
